SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Project Drawdown Book Version 1; Tropical + temperate tree intercropping current adoption value
Assumptions: Added values for temperate & tropical tree intercropping area as determined for Drawdown's version 1 of the book - excluded due to calculation error

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Lal et al. 2018; estimate for total tree intercropping area (in tropics); Lal, R., Smith, P., Jungkunst, H. F., Mitsch, W. J., Lehmann, J., Nair, P. SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: den Herder et al. 2017; % of arable land in EU; den Herder, M., Moreno, G., Mosquera-Losada, R. M., Palma, J. H., Sidiropoulou, A., Freijanes, J. J. SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Griscom et al. 2017; "maximum potential extent of implementation"; Griscom, B. W., Adams, J., Ellis, P. W., Houghton, R. A., Lomax, G., Miteva, D.
